meanings.definition: Heart-shaped with the attachment at the pointed end.
meanings.sent1: The obcordate leaf had a pointed tip like a heart.
meanings.sent2: The obcordate petals of the flower were delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: She found an obcordate rock that looked like a tiny heart.
meanings.sent4: The obcordate shadow cast by the tree resembled a heart on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The obcordate symbol on the map marked the location of the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Having a shape like a heart with the attachment at the pointed end.
meanings.sent1: The obcordate pendant she wore symbolized love and affection.
meanings.sent2: The obcordate design of the cake made it perfect for the wedding celebration.
meanings.sent3: He drew an obcordate smiley face on the card to express his feelings.
meanings.sent4: The obcordate clouds in the sky reminded her of love in nature.
meanings.sent5: The obcordate pattern on the fabric added a touch of romance to the dress.
